user.description:
Connect your appliance via the **SmartDevice app** to your home WiFi network.

**1. [Download](https://smartdevice.onelink.me/OrY5/8neax8lp) the app**
**2. Follow the [instructions](https://go.liebherr.com/cb2ct1) to connect your appliance**
**3. Get your API Key via the SmartDevice app**

Go to *Settings* in the SmartDevice app and select **“Beta features”**, then activate the HomeAPI.

Copy the API Key and paste it below. The API Key can only be copied **once**.

As soon as you leave the screen, the code **cannot** be copied again.

If you forgot your key, you need to create a new one via the app.

data.api_key: API Key from the SmartDevice App
